title: Botanic Romance
alternative_title: 靠近你会掉刺 / Kao jin hui diao ci
status: 靠近你会掉刺 / Kao jin hui diao ci
description:
Description :
        
In a world where humans gain plant characteristics (botanomorphism), our cactus-infected protagonist, Zhu WuLiang, is faced with a dilemma. He'll lose hair whenever he gets shy! Now, enters Hao Xiaofeng, WuLiang's tumbleweed-infected crush, whose carefree lifestyle involves getting blown away by the wind on a daily basis... Surely, it's more than enough to wreck WuLiang's mundane life!
